BE
RESOLVED,
That the
Mayer and the Clerk of the Board
of Supervisors are hereby author-
ized and directed to execute, in be-
half of the City and County of San
Francisco, duplicate counterparts
of proposed agreement between
Southern Pacific Company, a corpo-
ration, called
"Licensor and City
and County of San Francisco, a
municipal corporation, called
censee," permitting the City the
right to construct, maintain and
operate a three-inch (3") water pipe
line beneath the Southern Pacific
Company's right of wav near Lo-
mita Park, in the County of San
Mateo. State of California, to be
used in connection with the Muni-
cipal Air Port.
Adopted- -Board of Supervisors,
San Francisco, March 28, 1927.

man

Roncovieri

Resolution No. 27075 (New Series).

tween

(3") water pipe line beneath the

street car tracks near Lomita Park,
in the County of San Mateo, State
of California, to be used in connec-
